title: Himi 192
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e loto fakafo’ou
‘I hono tefito,
Pea ‘oku fonu ia,
‘I he ‘ofa tapu.
2.
Ko e loto haohaoa,
Pea angatonu,
‘Oku mā’oni’oni pē,
Pea angalelei.
3.
Ko hono hiki, ‘E ’Eiki
‘O e loto ‘o’ou,
Ko e ngāue mo’oni,
‘A e Laumālie.
4.
He ‘oku lei pehē ai pē
‘Eiki ‘a ho loto;
‘Oku kei ongongofua,
Ki he tō ki lalo.
5.
Sīsū ko e mamahi au
Pea u feinga loto,
Ko ‘eku fiema’u koe,
Pea mo ho ‘ofa.
6.
‘E ‘ikai fiemālie
‘A hoku loto ni
Ka ‘i ho folofola mai,
Kau fiemālie.
7.
Ko ho fakatapu ia,
Pea u toki ‘ilo
‘A e melino totonu,
Fakalaumālie.
8.
Pea u ma’u hoku ‘Iteni,
‘I he’eku tuku,
‘A ‘eku fai angakovi
Mo e angahala. *
